column1: Ajara is a census town and taluka headquarters Of Gadhinglaj Subdivision in Kolhapur district in the state of Maharashtra
Ajara is located at 16.12°N 74.2°E﻿ / 16.12; 74.2. It has an average elevation of 660 metres (2165 feet).
Ajara is known to be one of the southernmost talukas of Kolhapur District of Maharashtra. It is known for its scenic and green landscape
column2: as well as for the Ajara Ghansaal rice.
